headline.main: Washington State Seeks to Protect Nuclear Site Workers
headline.print_headline: Washington State Seeks to Protect Nuclear Site Workers

docs.snippet: Washington state asked a federal judge Wednesday to issue an injunction requiring the U.S. Department of Energy and its contractor to take steps to protect workers at a major nuclear waste storage site....
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington state asked a federal judge Wednesday to issue an injunction requiring the U.S. Department of Energy and its contractor to take steps to protect workers at a major nuclear waste storage site.

headline.main: Snapchat Picks Morgan Stanley, Goldman to Lead IPO: Sources
headline.print_headline: Snapchat Picks Morgan Stanley, Goldman to Lead IPO: Sources

docs.snippet: U.S. photo-sharing app Snapchat has chosen Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs Group Inc as lead underwriters for an initial public offering that could come as early as March, a source familiar with the situation said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. photo-sharing app Snapchat has chosen Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs Group Inc as lead underwriters for an initial public offering that could come as early as March, a source familiar with the situation said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Militants Shoot Dead Political Party Worker in Kashmir
headline.print_headline: Militants Shoot Dead Political Party Worker in Kashmir

docs.snippet: Militants shot dead a political party worker from Indian-controlled Kashmir's ruling coalition on Wednesday, police said, hours after two suspected militants were killed by armed forces in the region....
docs.lead_paragraph: Militants shot dead a political party worker from Indian-controlled Kashmir's ruling coalition on Wednesday, police said, hours after two suspected militants were killed by armed forces in the region.

headline.main: Italy Judge Jails Three for 20 Years Each Over Deadly 2015 Migrant Voyage
headline.print_headline: Italy Judge Jails Three for 20 Years Each Over Deadly 2015 Migrant Voyage

docs.snippet: An Italian judge sentenced three men to 20 years each in jail on Wednesday for their role in packing hundreds of migrants into a boat in which 49 suffocated in the Mediterranean last August, a legal source said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Italian judge sentenced three men to 20 years each in jail on Wednesday for their role in packing hundreds of migrants into a boat in which 49 suffocated in the Mediterranean last August, a legal source said.

headline.main: Panthers QB Newton Returns to Practice, Takes 1st-Team Reps
headline.print_headline: Panthers QB Newton Returns to Practice, Takes 1st-Team Reps

docs.snippet: Panthers quarterback Cam Newton returned to practice Wednesday, although it remains unclear if the league's MVP will play Sunday against the New Orleans Saints....
docs.lead_paragraph: Panthers quarterback Cam Newton returned to practice Wednesday, although it remains unclear if the league's MVP will play Sunday against the New Orleans Saints.

headline.main: Argentina: Soccer Club Played 30 Years on a Crooked Field
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Soccer Club Played 30 Years on a Crooked Field

docs.snippet: Talk about a crooked team: A club in soccer-mad Argentina has been playing nearly 30 years on a crooked field....
docs.lead_paragraph: Talk about a crooked team: A club in soccer-mad Argentina has been playing nearly 30 years on a crooked field.

headline.main: Officials Say Romanian Man Held Hostage in Nigeria Is Freed
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Romanian Man Held Hostage in Nigeria Is Freed

docs.snippet: Romania's foreign ministry says a Romanian engineer abducted in southern Nigeria has been freed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Romania's foreign ministry says a Romanian engineer abducted in southern Nigeria has been freed.

docs.snippet: Grain futures were mostly higher Thursday on the Chicago Board of Trade....

headline.main: San Jose State Water Polo Player Accused of Sexual Assaults
headline.print_headline: San Jose State Water Polo Player Accused of Sexual Assaults

docs.snippet: A San Jose State University water polo player temporarily suspended from campus following accusations that he sexually assaulted two women appears to have left the country, a university official said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A San Jose State University water polo player temporarily suspended from campus following accusations that he sexually assaulted two women appears to have left the country, a university official said Wednesday.

docs.snippet: The United States pumped out the least climate-changing pollution from fossil fuels in the first six months of this year than at any such period since 1991, federal energy officials said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States pumped out the least climate-changing pollution from fossil fuels in the first six months of this year than at any such period since 1991, federal energy officials said Wednesday.
